text: Toto balia basubila mana nibawuya mana nibalwanila idini nende omwandu kwabu nende emioyo chiabu khunjila ya Nyasaye, nende balia bahelesia(muhajirina) eshimenyo mana nibahabina(idini), abo nibo abeetsa abeene khubeene. Ne balia basuubila mana nibalawuya enywe mubula omunwa kwokhubachelama shiosi shiosi okhuula bawuye, ne nibenya halali mubahabine mudini mubahabine, okhuyiniakhwo khubandu balia abamulinabo indakano. Ne Nyasaye alolanga kamukholanga
